name: whichkey
description: which-key like menu for Visual Studio Code

bindings.name: Search in a project with a selection

whichkey.delay.markdownDescription: Delay (in milliseconds) for which-key menu to display.

whichkey.showIcons.markdownDescription: Controls whether to show or hide icons in the which-key menu.

whichkey.showButtons.markdownDescription: Controls whether to show or hide buttons in the which-key menu.

whichkey.useFullWidthCharacters.markdownDescription: Controls whether to use full width characters as key in the which-key menu.

markdownEnumDescriptions:
Menu items are sorted by the key in the following 'categories' then by a custom order within each 'category'.
The category order:
1. Single key (a, z, SPC, TAB, etc)
2. Function key (f11, F11, etc)
3. Modifier key (C-z, etc)
4. Others

 For the non-function key, the sort order of each character of the key:
1. SPC
2. Non-printable characters
3. DEL
4. ASCII symbols
5. Number
6. a-z
7. A-Z
8. Non-ASCII

 For function key, bindings will be sorted by the numeric order (e.g. F1, F2, F11, 12).
Menu items are sorted by bindings with non-number key first then by custom order.
Menu items are sorted by the binding type first then by custom order.
Menu items are sorted by the key in alphabetical order.
Menu items are sorted by bindings with non-number key first then by alphabetical order.
whichkey.sortOrder.markdownDescription: Controls the sorting order of the which-key menu items.

whichkey.bindings.markdownDescription: The bindings of the which key menu

bindings.name: Show all buffers/editors in active group
Show active file in tree/explorer view
Search in a project with a selection
Search all references in side bar
Toggle ignore trim whitespace in diff
Maximize editor group and hide side bar

default.name: Search in a project with a selection

whichkey.bindingOverrides.markdownDescription: Overrides bindings of the (default) which key

scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test-node && npm run test-web
